page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW OF 04160192
page.content: In our area we have part of Highworth and all of Hannington.Our part of Highworth is mainly new houses.There are two sewage works,one in Hannington and one just outside Highworth. The land is mainly farmland.There are twelve farms, mostly near Hannington,and many are intensively managed grassland. Through the area flows Bydemill Brook.It enters our area near Hampton Farm and runs to the North then on to the Thames.We have a disused railway track.The railway used to run from Highworth to Swindon.Such goods as milk were transported on it,and also men who were employed at the Swindon Railway Works.
